snippet: A former worker at the stricken Fukushima nuclear plant has complained that the plant operator knowingly placed crews at risk.
abstract: Former worker at stricken Fukushima nuclear plant files legal complaint against Tokyo Electric Power Company saying it knew risks of highly radioactive water but sent crews into flooded area during early days of 2011 crisis without adequate protection or warning.
lead_paragraph: A former worker at the stricken Fukushima nuclear plant has complained that the plant operator knowingly placed crews at risk.
